name: ClickOnce Deployment Manifest File
summary: Learn about .APPLICATION files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: APPLICATION files were designed to provide easy "one click" deployments of user-level Windows applications. They have a corresponding .APPREF-MS file that activates ClickOne for a program, which subsequently executes within the .NET framework in Windows.

description: File created for ClickOnce, a Microsoft framework used to deploy Windows applications over the Web; stores program deployment properties in an XML format, including name, version, description, deployment options, and dependencies; may also contain a digital signature.
